subject: MRS. DORIS PHILLIPS.
body:
MRS. DORIS PHILLIPS.
HOT LOTTO INC.THE NETHERLANDS.
(PROMOTION DEPARTMENT),
70 VANM EEGENSTRAAT,
AMSTERDAM, THE NETHERLANDS.
 
REF NO: MSW/56B-672GH/L
BATCH: 4583JL/WIN
 
Attn,       
  
DRAW RESULT CONFIRMATION FOR REF. NUMBER MSW/56B-672GH/L.

Being officially assigned to select winners across the globe, the management is pleased to inform you of the result of the HOT LOTTO INC.THE NETHERLANDS E-mail programs held on the 9th February 2007 and result where release on the 17th of April, 2007. Your E-mail address attached to BATCH: 4583JL/WIN, with REF No. MSW/56B-672GH/L.Drew lucky star numbers 34-32-90-43-32 which consequently won in this category, you have therefore been approved for a lump sum pay out of USD.750,000.00, with winning number 23-76-06-54-42-100.
 
Due to mix up of some numbers and names, we ask that you keep your winning information confidential until your claims has been processed and your money remitted to you. This is part of our security protocol to avoid double claiming and unwarranted abuse of this program by some participants. All participants were selected through a computer ballot system drawn from over 100,000 company and 50,000,000 individual email addresses and names from all over the world.
 
This lottery was promoted and sponsored by Software Companies in order to enhance and promote the use of Internet Explorer Users and Microsoft-wares around the globe.
 
To file for your claim, please contact our claim agent:
 
Dr. Smith Morgan
Claim Department office,
Hot Lotto Agency.
 
Contact Email: hotballsagents@aol.com
Tel no.: 0031-628-396-069
Fax no.: 0031-847-304-633

Congratulations  from our members of staff and thank you for being part of our promotional program.
 
Sincerely,
Mrs Doris Phillips (Co-ordinator),
HOT LOTTO INC.THE NETHERLANDS.
